activity_differential: child using stone pillar for support while moving
description: A young child is walking and exploring an outdoor stone-paved area, occasionally using a stone pillar for support. An adult is present at the beginning, possibly supervising or assisting. The camera follows the child closely, tracking their movement and actions as they interact with the environment.

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: Vegetation cannot be spatially above a concrete platform in a stable manner as described; typically, plants grow from or on the platform rather than being above it.
relationship_filter_metadata.label: physically_impossible
